effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.

short_effect.sun_moon: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.
